Partnerships between VR Agencies and Welfare/TANF Agencies

Vocational Rehabilitation agencies frequently partner with other government agencies. This visualization illustrates the areas in which VR agencies collaborate with Welfare/TANF agencies the most. This visualization uses data from the 2011 Survey of State Welfare Agencies.

Areas of Collaboration Between VR and Welfare / TANF Agencies, as Reported by VR Agencies

Powered by Socrata

Source: The 2011 National Survey of State Vocational Rehabilitation Agencies

Current VR Projects

© ExploreVR.org — ExploreVR is part of the Vocational Rehabilitation Research and Training Center (VR-RRTC). The VR-RRTC is a national center that builds the capacity of the public vocational rehabilitation (VR) program to improve employment outcomes for people with disabilities. The VR-RRTC is funded by the National Institute on Disability and Rehabilitation Research and the Rehabilitation Services Administration of the US Department of Education. Visit the VR-RRTC website (www.vr-rrtc.org) for more information about the centerâ€™s policy research, training, and technical assistance efforts.
